title: Getting to Know You
description: Maggie Fromm moved to LA to follow a dream: to become an actress and live happily ever after with her high school sweetheart. When her heart is broken after a year of eking out a living, Maggie finds herself fighting for her dream alone. Her luck may change when she meets Gwen Knowles, a talented and spirited director drawn to Maggie's energy on stage.As they work to bring an independent play to life, Maggie and Gwen face shadows from their pastâ€”but this time, they have each other.
author: Jennifer M.D. Cox
